Name: No Civilian Disguises
Tip: Do not start in or take any civilian disguise.

Name: No Disguise Changes
Tip: Do not change disguise after starting the mission.

Name: No Guard Disguises
Tip: Do not start in or take any guard disguise.

Name: No Unique Disguises
Tip: Do not start in or take any unique disguise (a disguise worn by only one or zero NPCs).

Name: No Waiter Disguises
Tip: Do not start in or take any waiter disguise (disguises allowed to openly poison food/drink).
